Posts.EditableText:
I tried to register an account via textadventures.co.uk and activelit.com. However, I receive the following error:

"Sorry, something went wrong
An error occurred while processing your request.

This has been logged, but it would be really helpful if you could let us know a bit more information about what you were doing - please contact us and we'll do our best to fix things."

On activelit.com it created the area, but did not send me an email to complete the registration. I also cannot set a password for my account, and can only log in via a Google account. I cannot log into the area I created on activelit.com at all...
Posts.HTML:
I tried to register an account via textadventures.co.uk and activelit.com. However, I receive the following error:

"Sorry, something went wrong
An error occurred while processing your request.

This has been logged, but it would be really helpful if you could let us know a bit more information about what you were doing - please contact us and we'll do our best to fix things."

On activelit.com it created the area, but did not send me an email to complete the registration. I also cannot set a password for my account, and can only log in via a Google account. I cannot log into the area I created on activelit.com at all...
